required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of a Private Hospital in Hong Kong Amid COVID-19 Pandemic
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of a Private Hospital in Hong Kong Amid COVID-19 Pandemic: A Descriptive Study of Patients With SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR Performed

brief_summary.textblock:
Hong Kong public healthcare system is facing tremendous pressure under the COVID-19 pandemic. As the virus spread in Hong Kong, Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital (HKSH) is one of the first private hospitals which immediately provide reliable and rapid COVID-19 test -- Reverse Transcription Polymerase Chain Reaction (RT-PCR). Early provision of the RT-PCR screening test for COVID-19 not only facilitates identification of COVID-19 but also contains the spread of the virus in the community and frontline medical staff.
Since description of role of private hospital in Hong Kong amid COVID-19 pandemic is lacking, this study will describe COVID-19 screening algorithm and methodology. A retrospective analysis on clinical characteristics, laboratory findings as well as outcome of patients who underwent COVID-19 test in HKSH is also performed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 Feb 2020 until the 14th consecutive day without any local infection in Hong Kong
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of asymptomatic subjects (%) who underwent COVID 19 test

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with recent contact history
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 Feb 2020 until the 14th consecutive day without any local infection in Hong Kong
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects (%) with recent contact history

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with recent travel history
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 Feb 2020 until the 14th consecutive day without any local infection in Hong Kong
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects (%) with recent travel history

arm_group.description: Subjects who underwent COVID-19 test in HKSH during the study period

study_pop.textblock: Subjects who underwent COVID-19 test in HKSH during the study period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who underwent COVID-19 test in HKSH during the study period
